sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export const Movie = ({users}) => { console.log('users length:::', users.length) if (users.length === 0) return null const UserRow = (user,index) => { return( {index + 1} {user.firstName} {user.lastName} {user.email} ) } const userTable = users.map((user,index) => UserRow(user,index)) return(

Users

{userTable}
User Id Firstname Lastname Email
) }
